document_data.name: ''Fire Dagger''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fire daggers''''' were a type of common [[enchanted]] simple weapons often found in [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Powers: These simple-looking daggers possessed a ''+2'' offensive enchantment as well as increased the wielder's defense. Each his with this dagger had a change of lighting the target on fire.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1281 DR]], several of these magic daggers could be found in [[Easthaven]] of the [[Ten Towns]] and in the depths of [[Dragon's Eye]] on the [[Spine of the World]].
